attributes.action: Amend the law preventing those who had a transfusion since 1980 from giving blood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many blood product recipients who wish to give back to the service are barred from doing so, even though a simple test could verify whether their own blood carries vCJD or other blood-borne diseases. Such tests are performed by doctors so that organs can be donated after death - but why not test the blood of willing but frustrated blood donors?
